name: Akamai Technologies
summary: Welcome to Akamaiu2019s Enhanced DNS service. Enhanced DNS is designed to integrate easily with your existing DNS infrastructure to provide a secure, high performance, highly available and scalable solution for DNS hosting. As part of this service, Akamai runs name servers in multiple networks and in many geographic locations that are capable of resolving queries for your zones. Akamaiu2019s IP An
details: Welcome to Akamaiu2019s Enhanced DNS service. Enhanced DNS is designed to integrate easily with your existing DNS infrastructure to provide a secure, high performance, highly available and scalable solution for DNS hosting. As part of this service, Akamai runs name servers in multiple networks and in many geographic locations that are capable of resolving queries for your zones. Akamaiu2019s IP Anycast technology is also capable of providing an unprecedented level of reliability and performance for name resolution.

name: Amazon Web Services
summary: Amazon Route 53 (Route 53) is part of Amazon.coms cloud computing platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS). Route 53 provides scalable and highly available Domain Name System (DNS). The name (Route 53) is a reference to TCP or UDP port 53, where DNS server requests are addressed.
details: Amazon Route 53 (Route 53) is part of Amazon.coms cloud computing platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS). Route 53 provides scalable and highly available Domain Name System (DNS). The name (Route 53) is a reference to TCP or UDP port 53, where DNS server requests are addressed.

name: ARIN Reg-RWS
summary: ARIN offers public access to ARIN registration data via a number of services. Traditionally, these services are known in the industry as Whois in reference to the public data service of the ARPANET, precursor of todays modern Internet. Whois services are offered by all the Regional Internet Registries (RIRs), most Internet Routing Registries (IRRs) and most domain name registries and registrars.
details: ARIN offers public access to ARIN registration data via a number of services. Traditionally, these services are known in the industry as Whois in reference to the public data service of the ARPANET, precursor of todays modern Internet. Whois services are offered by all the Regional Internet Registries (RIRs), most Internet Routing Registries (IRRs) and most domain name registries and registrars.

name: Cloudflare
summary: CloudFlare, Inc. is a U.S. company that provides a content delivery network and distributed domain name server services, sitting between the visitor and the CloudFlare users hosting provider, acting as a reverse proxy for websites. Its network protects, speeds up, and improves availability for a website or mobile application with a change in DNS.
details: CloudFlare, Inc. is a U.S. company that provides a content delivery network and distributed domain name server services, sitting between the visitor and the CloudFlare users hosting provider, acting as a reverse proxy for websites. Its network protects, speeds up, and improves availability for a website or mobile application with a change in DNS.

name: DNS Made Easy
summary: DNS Made Easyu2019s API is available to perform core functions of the DNS Made Easy web interface programmatically. DNS Made Easyu2019s API is a powerful resource and a great alternative to DNS management through our conventional web interface. Use of the REST based API is available free to all Business and Corporate Memberships.n
details: DNS Made Easyu2019s API is available to perform core functions of the DNS Made Easy web interface programmatically. Use of the REST based API is available free to all Business and Corporate Memberships.n

name: DNSimple
summary: DNSimple provides DNS hosting and domain registration that is simple and friendly. We provide a full API and an easy-to-use web interface so you can get your domain registered and set up with a minimal amount of effort.
details: DNSimple provides DNS hosting and domain registration that is simple and friendly. We provide a full API and an easy-to-use web interface so you can get your domain registered and set up with a minimal amount of effort.

name: Dyn
summary: Dyn helps companies monitor, control, and optimize online infrastructure to improve end-user experience. Their Internet performance product suite includes Dyn Internet Intelligence, IP Transit Intelligence, Traffic Director, and DNS APIs. Dyn provides enterprise level sales and pricing for their DNS, and email services.
details: Dyn helps companies monitor, control, and optimize online infrastructure to improve end-user experience. Their Internet performance product suite includes Dyn Internet Intelligence, IP Transit Intelligence, Traffic Director, and DNS APIs. Dyn provides enterprise level sales and pricing for their DNS, and email services.

name: Google
summary: Use Googles infrastructure for production quality, high volume DNS serving. Your users will have reliable, low-latency access to Googles infrastructure from anywhere in the world using our network of Anycast name servers.
details: Use Googles infrastructure for production quality, high volume DNS serving. Your users will have reliable, low-latency access to Googles infrastructure from anywhere in the world using our network of Anycast name servers.

name: GSLB.me
summary: GSLB.me comes with a fully-fledged REST-based API to manage your DNS services. Using the API you can add, modify, delete, enable and disable domains (GSLB.me refers to DNS domains as u201czonesu201c) and records. You can also manage your geohosts and more features are scheduled for next releases.
details: GSLB.me comes with a fully-fledged REST-based API to manage your DNS services. Using the API you can add, modify, delete, enable and disable domains (GSLB.me refers to DNS domains as u201czonesu201c) and records. You can also manage your geohosts and more features are scheduled for next releases.

name: Rackspace
summary: Maintaining the integrity and functionality of a domain name system (DNS) can be challenging. Compromised protocols, high costs, and complex migrations are just a few of the obstacles. Take control of your DNS, using our Cloud Control Panel and API to list, add, modify, and remove domains, subdomains, and records, as well as import and export domains and recordsu2014at any time and at no additiona
details: Maintaining the integrity and functionality of a domain name system (DNS) can be challenging. Compromised protocols, high costs, and complex migrations are just a few of the obstacles. Take control of your DNS, using our Cloud Control Panel and API to list, add, modify, and remove domains, subdomains, and records, as well as import and export domains and recordsu2014at any time and at no additional cost. Globally positioned and load balanced, our DNS servers employ a user-friendly interface, powerful RESTful API, and easy migrations.

name: StatDNS
summary: This is a REST API allowing to perform DNS queries over HTTP, and to get reverse PTR records for both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses. It outputs JSON-encoded DNS responses and can be useful in server-side environments where you cannot perform DNS queries locally, for client-side Web Applications (including Web browser extensions), and for DNS operators. There is no rate limit of any sort at the moment, a
details: This is a REST API allowing to perform DNS queries over HTTP, and to get reverse PTR records for both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses. It outputs JSON-encoded DNS responses and can be useful in server-side environments where you cannot perform DNS queries locally, for client-side Web Applications (including Web browser extensions), and for DNS operators. There is no rate limit of any sort at the moment, and the service is free for everyone to use.

name: Zerigo
summary: Zerigo makes DNS worry-free. With a REST API, user-friendly interface, and industry-leading advanced security and features, Zerigo DNS makes DNS easy and efficient.
details: Zerigo makes DNS worry-free. With a REST API, user-friendly interface, and industry-leading advanced security and features, Zerigo DNS makes DNS easy and efficient.
